sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' class MovieRow extends React.Component{ viewMovie() { const url = "http://www.themoviedb.org/movie/" + this.props.movie.id window.location.href = url } render() { return

Name:{this.props.movie.title}

Rate:{this.props.movie.vote_average}

Overview:{this.props.movie.overview}
} } export default MovieRow
